subtitle1: Driven by the desire to learn and innovate,

senac.title: Technical Course – Information Technology
senac.description: Technical Course in Information Technology, with a focus on software development and IT infrastructure.

college.title: Descomplica College – Information Systems
college.description: Global Network, Mobile Development, Smart Data Structures, Database Development, Object-Oriented Programming, and Internet of Things (IoT), Cloud.

react.title: Development with React and Next.js
react.description: Learned advanced hooks such as useReducer, useCallback, and memoization, as well as concepts related to UX/UI, performance optimization, caching, and SEO.

node.title: Development with Node.js and Express.js
node.description: Focused on creating and consuming RESTful APIs, database integration, authentication and authorization, database modeling, web application security, and the use of ORMs.

docker.title: Docker
docker.description: Learned and practiced application containerization, Docker image creation, container management, orchestration with Docker Compose, and integration with CI/CD pipelines.

moreAboutMe.title: More about
moreAboutMe.description: experience with modern libraries and frameworks such as React, Next.js, Vite, and React Native (Expo), as well as working with concepts like S.O.L.I.D, K.I.S.S, and D.R.Y. On the back end, I work with Node.js, TypeScript, REST APIs, relational and non-relational databases, tools and technologies such as ORMs (Prisma, Drizzle), Docker, and architectures like Hexagonal.

frontend.description: I have hands-on experience with modern libraries and frameworks such as React, Next.js, Vite, and React Native (Expo), as well as working with concepts like S.O.L.I.D, K.I.S.S, and D.R.Y. On the back end, I work with Node.js, TypeScript, REST APIs, relational and non-relational databases, tools and technologies such as ORMs (Prisma, Drizzle), Docker, and architectures like Hexagonal.

projects.title: React apps, Node APIs, Experimental apps
